main event: A bright object, described as burning and descending behind the mountains, was observed in Woodland Park, Colorado.
interesting points: The object changed colors from red to blue to green as it descended., Multiple observers reported seeing the object for about 10 seconds., Witnesses described the object as round with a tail of burning matter., Estimates of the object's size ranged from that of a nickel to a tennis ball., The initial observation included a sound report similar to past observations.
sighted object: a bright, burning object with a tail
witness description: military personnel and a local machine shop foreman
